title: The Magnificent Human Soul - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 3/21/18
itunes:title: The Magnificent Human Soul - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 3/21/18
description:
George Noory and researcher George Walter Chyz examine his work on the human soul and consciousness, and how the heart can give us guidance to become one with the universe.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
